entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:39 p.m. MST Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow and blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains late this evening and overnight. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h except 50 gusting to 70 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains in the evening and after midnight. Wind becoming light overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 5 April 2023
